title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the selection does not work.

Observed Behavior: The first time I try to select the label item in the library outline view, it does not get selected.

Expected Behavior: The second time I attempt to select the label item, it gets selected successfully.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Try to select the label item in the library outline view for the first time.
3. Observe that the label item does not get selected.
4. Try to select the label item again for the second time.
5. Observe that the label item gets selected successfully.
